Feature.Name: Anchor
Feature.Text: You can use an action to touch the token to a boat or ship. For the next 24 hours, the vessel can't be moved by any means. Touching the token to the vessel again ends the effect. When the effect ends, the token disappears.

MagicProperty.Name: Feather Token (Anchor)
MagicProperty.Description: This tiny object looks like a feather. Different types of feather tokens exist, each with a different single-use effect. The GM chooses the kind of token or determines it randomly. 01-20: Anchor 21-35: Bird 36-50: Fan 51-65: Swan Boat 66-90: Tree 91-00: Whip
